entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
